Positions held: 1974-75 Teaching Asst., Dept. of Plant Pathology and Entomology, Natl. Taiwan Univ., Taipei (Dr. Hong-Ji Su)
1976 Research Asst., Inst. of Botany, Academia Sinica, Taipei (Dr. Tsong-Teh Kuo)
1978-79 Teaching Asst., Div. of Microbiology, Cornell Univ. Med. Coll., New York, New York (Dr. Zsolt Harsanyi)
1978-82 Research Asst., Division of Allergy and Immunology, Cornell Univ. Med. College New York, New York
1982-85 Postdoc. Fellow, Department of Microbiology, Univ. of Texas Health Science Center, Dallas, Texas (Drs. Jonathan W. Uhr and Ellen S. Vitetta)
1985-87
Research Asst. Professor, Department of Microbiology, Univ. of Texas Health Science Center, Dallas, Texas
1987- present Asst. Prof., Department of Microbiology and Immunol., Temple Univ. School of Medicine, Phila., PA
Awards:
1974-76 Grad. Fellowship, Ministry of Education, Republic of China
1976-78 Grad. Fellowship, Mt. Sinai School of Med., New York, New York
1978-81 Tuition Scholarship, Cornell Univ. Med. College, New York, New York 1978-81 Research Assistantship, Cornell Univ. Med. College, New York, New York,
Publications (Full-length papers only):
Jacobson, E.B., Baine, Y., Dhabhar, P.J., Chen, Y .- W., Pernis, B., Siskind, G.W., and Thorbecke, G.J. 1981. Mechanism of escape from anti-IgD suppression of the immune response of allotype homozygous as compared to heterozygous mice. In Proceedings of the Second International Conference on B Lymphocytes in the Immune Response. Edited by N. Klinman, D.E. Mosier, I. Scher and E.S. Vitetta. Elsevier/North Holland, New York, pp. 221-228.
Jacobson, E.B., Baine, Y., Chen Y .- W., Flotte, T., O'Neil, M.J., Pernis, B., Siskind, G.W., Thorbecke, G.J., and Tonda, P. 1981. Physiology of IgD. I. Compensatory phenomena in B-lymphocyte activation in mice treated with anti-IgD antibodies. J. Exp. Med. 154:318-332. Baine, Y., Chen, Y .- W., Jacobson, E.B., Pernis, B., Siskind, G.W., and Thorbecke, G.J. 1982. Physiology of IsD. II. Lack of humoral immune response in lymph nodes of mice reated with anti-IgD from birth. Eur. J. Immunol. 12(10):882-886.
Thorbecke, G.J., Baine, Y., Chen, Y .- W., Xue, B., Pernis, B., Siskind, G.W., and Jacobson, E.B. 1982. Effect of allotype specific anti-IgD on the immune responses of homozygous mice. Annals of N.Y. Acad. Sci. 399:305-309.
Baine, Y., Chen, Y .- W., Jacobson, E.B., Pernis, B., Siskind, G.W., and Thorbecke, G.J. 1 982. Chronic suppression in mice with anti-IgD: role of B cell numbers. Anals of N.Y. Acad. Sci. 399:360-367.
PHS 398 (Rev, 10/88)
